articles.description: The Dave’s Funniest Joke of the Fringe award, voted for by members of the public, was back for the first time since 2019 – and the top ten best jokes have been revealed.
articles.content: Comedy critics attended hundreds of shows across the Edinburgh Festival Fringe to create a shortlist which was voted on by 2,000 members of the public, who were not told the names of the comedians in… [+922 chars]

articles.author: Charles Harrison
articles.title: Prince William braced for huge bombshell as Harry to make 'shock drop' on Royal Family - Express
articles.description: PRINCE Harry's memoir is set to be dropped on the Royal Family at the same time as the public in a 'shock drop' that could put Prince William on the backfoot, it has been claimed.
